official_title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the third week in June of each year as National Veterans' Hospital Week.

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the third week of June of each year as "National Veterans' Hospital Week."

titles.title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the third week in June of each year as National Veterans' Hospital Week.
